response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its worth, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering the product to you for $14,500. This price reflects my desire to make this exceptional item accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for my efforts and resources invested in it. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 14500}
